questions.question_text: Which is used to configure the VMware Content Gateway service before adding it to the Unified Access Gateway?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Attachment encryption is supported by SEG and hyperlink transformation on Workspace ONE Boxer, only if these features for the Boxer app configuration are enabled on the UEM console.

https://gocoding.org/implementation-recommendations-in-workspace-one/#Attachment_Encryption

Selected Answer: C
With office 365 and Exchange 2010/2013/2016/2019, SEG supports attachment encryption. 

DLP can be imposed at the application level, but SEG does not encrypt attachments for Workspace ONE Boxer.

Well, it's not easy to be sure, but I think it's C. Workspace ONE Web is not a mail solution so I guess it can't be the answer I guess ?

choices.A: Workspace ONE Web with DLP enabled.
choices.B: Workspace ONE Content with DLP enabled.

questions.question_text:
A Workspace ONE administrator is configuring email for an organization that uses Microsoft Exchange Online (Office 365). The organization has an extreme security posture and wants to require all email attachments be encrypted.

Which component is needed to meet the organizationâ€™s requirement?
